pr_title: [IOTDB-948] Use binary search when checking the follower's match index when catchup

timeline.author: jt2594838

replies.bodyText:
this is used to fix the IT tests that the exception only shows the message bug but lacks the exception type. I saw you have fixed in the commit[1], but I think it's better to be consistent with the single server.
So if you agree with me, I would re-add the exception type you've deleted in [1], otherwise, I'll change the code here as normal.
[1] 83e916a
replies.author: neuyilan

replies.bodyText: have changed the code as normal
replies.author: neuyilan

replies.bodyText: I think it would be better to think from the user side. Such exceptions does few meaning to users, so we'd better remove them for clarity.
replies.author: jt2594838

timeline.message: use binary search when check the matched index when snapshot
use binary search when check the matched index when snapshot
